## Looksi here1!! Shiny!

```{r}
#| echo: false
# Load the diamonds dataset
library(ggplot2)
data(diamonds)
# Scatterplot of carat vs price
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
geom_point(color = "blue", alpha = 0.5) +
ggtitle("Carat vs Price") +
xlab("Carat") +
ylab("Price (USD)")
```

Beautiful!
